casebody.data:
STARK
v.
RATASHARA-STARK. No. 353A04-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. R. Michael Bruce, Danbury, for Ratashara-Stark.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of February 2008 by Plaintiff to Amend Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
